name: Wonderful World Of Man
description:
Quest through to the top of the Tower of Man. Can you? Or will the many who came before you come to halt your climb...

Run through the labyrinthian maze of the Tower of Man, avoiding the eyes of those that came before you.  What awaits you at the top?  You don't know, but you can't help but wonder what it could be...

Made with Unreal Engine 4
